segments.text: We ’ re going to the movies . Will you join us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m very sorry I can ’ t .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m afraid I have some business to attend to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then would you like to have lunch with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d love to but I have to help John with his math problems right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like me to give you a lift ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thanks . His home is not far and I can walk there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on . It ’ s no trouble at all .
segments.speaker: S1
